attributes.action: You recently rejected my petition about renaming raccoons. You should reconsider
attributes.additional_details: Raccoons being called Raccoons isn't fair; they're clearly small bears, that live in trash and have the same colouration as the panda bear. It's not like I'm making no sense.
attributes.background: Earlier today, I received an email telling me that you had rejected my petition to rename raccoons Trash Pandas. I disagree with this decision and firmly believe that my petition has merit. We live in a democracy. It is a major part of a democracy that you listen to the people. 6 people supported me
